title: Toyota registers highest-ever monthly sales in January at 24,609 units
description: Toyota Kirloskar Motor announced its record-breaking monthly wholesale figures for January, having dispatched 24,609 units. This marks a notable 92% rise as compared to same month last year. Due to irregularities found in the certification tests for the diesel powertrain, the company has temporarily suspended the dispatch of its three models.
